ComicInfo.Title: Home on the Range, Rabbit!; Sgt. Duck; Duck Trek; Into the Breach! or Follow Me If Y'Got Th' Balls!; Bounce on the Wild Side!; The Wraith's Pal, Inspector Mulchberry; The Fall of the House of Silver
ComicInfo.Summary:
The classic humor comic anthology continues with early work by Dave Sim, Alan Kupperberg and Michael Gilbert.
Editorial: Friedrich, Leialoha (1 page text)
Rick Rabbit: Home on the Range, Rabbit!: Leialoha (10 pages)
The Beavers: Sim (11 pages)
On the Skids!: Into the Breach!: Kupperberg (7 pages)
Tales of the Oregon Bobcat: Bounce On The Wild Side!: Bucher (6 pages)
Tales of the Oregon Bobcat: Bucher (1 page)
Tales of the Oregon Bobcat: Bucher (1 page)
The Wraith's Pal, Inspector Mulchberry: Gilbert (1 page)
The Wraith: The Fall of the House of Silver: Gilbert (11 pages)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:30:48. [CVDB17527]
ComicInfo.Writer: Steve Leialoha, Dave Sim, Alan Kupperberg, Dorothy Bucher, Michael T. Gilbert, Dorthy Bucher, Mike Friedrich
ComicInfo.Penciller: Steve Leialoha, Dave Sim, Alan Kupperberg, Dorothy Bucher, Michael T. Gilbert, Alan Kupperberg, Dave Sim, Dorthy Bucher, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Inker: Steve Leialoha, Dave Sim, Alan Kupperberg, Dorothy Bucher, Michael T. Gilbert, Alan Kupperberg, Dave Sim, Dorthy Bucher, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Letterer: Orz, Dave Sim, Alan Kupperberg, Dorothy Bucher, Michael T. Gilbert
